# allowsDragging

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value indicating whether the view can accept new PDF documents dragged into it by the user.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var allowsDragging: Bool { get set }
```

## Dragging in a View

- **acceptsDraggedFiles**: A Boolean value indicating whether you can drag a file into the view.
